## AgentResolver class

AgentResolver is a class that allows to interact with the issuer's agent to get revocation status.

 AgentResolver

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class AgentResolver implements CredentialStatusResolver 
```
**Implements:** [CredentialStatusResolver](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolver.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolve(credentialStatus, credentialStatusResolveOptions)](./js-sdk.agentresolver.resolve.md) |  | resolve is a method to resolve a credential status from an agent. |
